report.title: Habitats for population call
report.description: Return a list of habitats for a lookup parameter.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM terms hab JOIN termlists_terms tt on tt.term_id=hab.id AND tt.deleted=false JOIN termlists tl on tl.id=tt.termlist_id AND tl.title='NPMS 2014 Habitat Names' AND tl.deleted=false WHERE hab.deleted=false
